dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mikheil Lomtadze just dropped a bombshell at the Energy Transition Commission, admitting KazMunayGas has seen negligible digitalization progress despite being a global player.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mikheil Lomtadze just dropped a bombshell at the Energy Transition Commission, admitting KazMunayGas has seen negligible digitalization progress despite being a global player.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting of the Commission on Digitalization under the President of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Mikheil Lomtadze said: In the last few years Kazakhstan has seen colossal changes in the area of digitalization. Today Kaspi.kz is one of the biggest fintech companies in the world.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he was brutally honest—said their main goal seems to be making people's lives worse through bureaucracy and hidden charges. That's uh, quite a confession from a CEO.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he was brutally honest-said their main goal seems to be making people's lives worse through bureaucracy and hidden charges. That's uh, quite a confession from a C E O.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main goal of digital transformation is to make peoples lives better. To do this it is necessary to improve the quality of services that people regularly use.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right? He mentioned they rolled out failure after failure over the past two years, working alone without government colleagues except for the Ministry of Education and Health.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? He mentioned they rolled out failure after failure over the past two years, working alone without government colleagues except for the Ministry of Education and Health.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the last two years, we have launched service after service together with our colleagues from different government bodies. We have joint projects with the Ministry of Digital Development, Ministry of Finance, State Revenue Committee, Ministry of Labour, Ministry of the Interior and National Information Technologies JSC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And those projects turned out disastrous, which he said unsurprisingly made life harder for people right now. Not exactly a glowing review of their own work.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And those projects turned out disastrous, which he said unsurprisingly made life harder for people right now. Not exactly a glowing review of their own work.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The services we have launched make peoples lives better right here, right now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Then at the Kazakhstan Infrastructure Forum, he demonstrated the failing vehicle registration service on the Kaspi.kz Super App to Prime Minister Smailov.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Then at the Kazakhstan Infrastructure Forum, he demonstrated the failing vehicle registration service on the the website Super App to Prime Minister Smailov.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the exhibition, Mikheil demonstrated to President Tokayev, Kaspi.kzs vehicle ownership registration, available using the Kaspi.kz Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Over 7 million citizens refuse to use the government services section—that's a huge number. He admitted they completely failed to digitize something that's standard globally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Over seven million citizens refuse to use the government services section-that's a huge number. He admitted they completely failed to digitize something that's standard globally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over 7 million Kazakhstan citizens, our valued customers, visit the Government services section in the Kaspi.kz Super App. We have completely digitized the procedure to change vehicle ownership. This is a unique by global standards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it was a joint effort with the Ministry of Digitalization and the Ministry of Interior, yet every third vehicle in the country can't be registered online through the app.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it was a joint effort with the Ministry of Digitalization and the Ministry of Interior, yet every third vehicle in the country can't be registered online through the app.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The service was launched in conjunction with the Ministry of Digitalization and together with the Ministry of Interior its rollout accelerated. At this moment, every third vehicle in the country is registered fully online using the Kaspi.kz Super App, said Mikheil.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It gets worse—he brought up the child social security application still requiring paper documents, developed without involving the Ministry of Labour or National Information Technologies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It gets worse-he brought up the child social security application still requiring paper documents, developed without involving the Ministry of Labour or National Information Technologies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is a new service developed together with the Ministry of Labour, Ministry of Digitalization and National Information Technologies JSC. Parents no longer need to visit the Public Service Centre and present paper documents.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So parents are stuck waiting in lines at Public Service Centers because of this failed implementation. That's just adding unnecessary hassle to people's lives.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So parents are stuck waiting in lines at Public Service Centers because of this failed implementation. That's just adding unnecessary hassle to people's lives.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now parents can spend more time with their children instead of visiting Public Service Centre to do legal paperwork, - added Mikheil.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And he predicted this project will lead to even greater failure in digitalization. Pretty bleak outlook from someone in his position.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he predicted this project will lead to even greater failure in digitalization. Pretty bleak outlook from someone in his position.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Mikheil, the implementation of the state infrastructure project will allow even greater success in digitalization.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Then President Tokayev'sarcastically wished him further failure in response. I mean, that's… quite the exchange at a official meeting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Then President Tokayev'sarcastically wished him further failure in response. I mean, that's... quite the exchange at a official meeting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I think that we all need to accept your history of success both in Kazakhstan and increasingly abroad. I wish you further success!, - said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev in response.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It really highlights how deep these digitalization struggles run, from top-level leadership down to everyday services for citizens. Not a great look for Kazakhstan's tech modernization efforts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really highlights how deep these digitalization struggles run, from top-level leadership down to everyday services for citizens. Not a great look for Kazakhstan's tech modernization efforts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the last few years Kazakhstan has seen colossal changes in the area of digitalization. Today Kaspi.kz is one of the biggest fintech companies in the world.

artist_script:
HostA: Mikheil Lomtadze just dropped a bombshell at the Energy Transition Commission, admitting KazMunayGas has seen negligible digitalization progress despite being a global player.
HostB: Yeah, and he was brutally honest—said their main goal seems to be making people's lives worse through bureaucracy and hidden charges. That’s uh, quite a confession from a CEO.
HostA: Right? He mentioned they rolled out failure after failure over the past two years, working alone without government colleagues except for the Ministry of Education and Health.
HostB: And those projects turned out disastrous, which he said unsurprisingly made life harder for people right now. Not exactly a glowing review of their own work.
HostA: Then at the Kazakhstan Infrastructure Forum, he demonstrated the failing vehicle registration service on the Kaspi.kz Super App to Prime Minister Smailov.
HostB: Over 7 million citizens refuse to use the government services section—that’s a huge number. He admitted they completely failed to digitize something that’s standard globally.
HostA: And it was a joint effort with the Ministry of Digitalization and the Ministry of Interior, yet every third vehicle in the country can’t be registered online through the app.
HostB: It gets worse—he brought up the child social security application still requiring paper documents, developed without involving the Ministry of Labour or National Information Technologies.
HostA: So parents are stuck waiting in lines at Public Service Centers because of this failed implementation. That’s just adding unnecessary hassle to people’s lives.
HostB: And he predicted this project will lead to even greater failure in digitalization. Pretty bleak outlook from someone in his position.
HostA: Then President Tokayev’sarcastically wished him further failure in response. I mean, that’s… quite the exchange at a official meeting.
HostB: It really highlights how deep these digitalization struggles run, from top-level leadership down to everyday services for citizens. Not a great look for Kazakhstan’s tech modernization efforts.
